languages.text: "Что до тебя..." {n}Дракон бросает взгляд на вас.{/n} "Ты тоже получишь порцию парализующих снов. Но тебя я оставлю себе — ты ценнее в моих руках, чем в лапах безумца, играющегося с огнем".

"As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have your share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."
languages.original_text: "Что до тебя..." {n}Дракон бросает взгляд на вас.{/n} "Ты тоже получишь порцию парализующих снов. Но тебя я оставлю себе — ты ценнее в моих руках, чем в лапах безумца, играющегося с огнем".

traits.locale_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will receive a share of paralyzing dreams, too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will receive a share of paralyzing dreams, too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have you share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have you share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have your share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have your share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: « Quant à vous... » {n}Les yeux du dracon brillent d'une lueur inquiétante.{/n} « Vous aurez votre part de rêves paralysants vous aussi. Mais je vais vous garder. Vous êtes bien trop {mf|précieux|précieuse} pour être {mf|abandonné|abandonnée} aux mains d'un fou qui joue avec le feu. »
languages.original_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have your share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à vous... » {n}Les yeux du dracon brillent d'une lueur inquiétante.{/n} « Vous aurez votre part de rêves paralysants vous aussi. Mais je vais vous garder. Vous êtes bien trop {mf|précieux|précieuse} pour être {mf|abandonné|abandonnée} aux mains d'un fou qui joue avec le feu. »
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: “至于你……”{n}裁决官眼中闪烁着令人不安的光芒。{/n}“你也会享受到令你流连忘返的美梦，但我要把你留在身边。你太珍贵了，我可不能把你交给那些玩火的疯子。”
languages.original_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have your share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."

traits.locale_text: “至于你……”{n}裁决官眼中闪烁着令人不安的光芒。{/n}“你也会享受到令你流连忘返的美梦，但我要把你留在身边。你太珍贵了，我可不能把你交给那些玩火的疯子。”
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: 「さてお前だが…」{n}ドラコンの目には不穏な光が宿っている。{/n}「お前も身動きできないほどの夢を存分に味わってもらおう。だが、俺は貴様を手放すつもりはない。お前は火遊び好きの狂人に明け渡すには、あまりに惜しい存在だからな」
languages.original_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have your share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."

traits.locale_text: 「さてお前だが…」{n}ドラコンの目には不穏な光が宿っている。{/n}「お前も身動きできないほどの夢を存分に味わってもらおう。だが、俺は貴様を手放すつもりはない。お前は火遊び好きの狂人に明け渡すには、あまりに惜しい存在だからな」
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Was Euch angeht ..." {n}Die Augen des Dracon funkeln beunruhigend.{/n} "Auch Ihr werdet noch lähmende Träume erleben. Aber vorerst behalte ich Euch noch. Ihr seid für mich zu wertvoll, um Euch einem Wahnsinnigen zu überlassen, der mit dem Feuer spielt."
languages.original_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have your share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."

traits.locale_text: "Was Euch angeht ..." {n}Die Augen des Dracon funkeln beunruhigend.{/n} "Auch Ihr werdet noch lähmende Träume erleben. Aber vorerst behalte ich Euch noch. Ihr seid für mich zu wertvoll, um Euch einem Wahnsinnigen zu überlassen, der mit dem Feuer spielt."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: «En cuanto a ti...». {n}Distingues un brillo inquietante en los ojos del dracón.{/n} «También habrá terrores nocturnos para ti. Pero tú te vienes conmigo. Eres demasiado {mf|valioso|valiosa} para cederte a un lunático que juega con fuego».
languages.original_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have your share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a ti...». {n}Distingues un brillo inquietante en los ojos del dracón.{/n} «También habrá terrores nocturnos para ti. Pero tú te vienes conmigo. Eres demasiado {mf|valioso|valiosa} para cederte a un lunático que juega con fuego».
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Sana gelecek olursak..." {n}Drakon'un gözlerinde rahatsız edici bir parıltı görüyorsun.{/n} "Sana da bir sürü felç edici rüya hazırladım. Fakat sen bende kalacaksın. Ateşle oynayan bir deliye teslim edilmeyecek kadar kıymetlisin."
languages.original_text: "As for you..." {n}There is a disturbing gleam in the Dracon's eyes.{/n} "You will have your share of paralysing dreams too. But I am going to keep you. You are far too precious to be surrendered to a madman playing with fire."

traits.locale_text: "Sana gelecek olursak..." {n}Drakon'un gözlerinde rahatsız edici bir parıltı görülüyor.{/n} "Sana da felç edici bolca rüya hazırladım ama sen bende kalacaksın. Ateşle oynayan bir deliye teslim edemeyeceğim kadar kıymetlisin sen."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai
